edge: Alma and Ennis divorce in 1975.
Ennis and Jack meet infrequently for private fishing trips while their respective marriages deteriorate.
Alma takes custody of Alma Jr. And Jenny,
Alma marries Monroe, manager of the grocery store where she works.
Ennis has a short-lived romantic relationship with a waitress named Cassie.
When Alma and Ennis are alone in the kitchen during a Thanksgiving dinner, she confronts him about his relationship with Jack.
The text doesn't provide any direct relationship between Alma and Cassie.
Lureen abandons the rodeo and goes into business with her father, with Jack working in sales.

Upon hearing about Alma's divorce from Ennis, Jack drives to Wyoming and tells Ennis that they should live together, but Ennis refuses to move away from his children.
At the end of a tryst disguised as a fishing trip, Ennis tells Jack that he cannot see him again for months due to work demands.
